description: Alright now that you know how to make a spell your probably asking "Ok cool but how do I do anything complex or interesting with this?". That is what we will be going over here.
/4/As a slight heads up, in this we will be referring to the method your spell uses to target something as its "/6/shape/6/", and the effect it has on the world as its "/6/action/s/6/"./4/

Ok lets start this off with something simple. Lets say you want your spell to effect a small area around where it lands. To do this you will want to add the /b/Range/b/ modifier onto the spell. Doing so will unlock a button to the right of your /6/shape/6/, if it supports it, that will increase or decrease the Radius the spell resolves in. The same goes for most if not all modifiers.

But what if you want multiple actions in one spell? That is where the /b/Book of Rote/b/ comes in. The /b/Book of Rote/b/ is a /5/Teir 2/5/ item that allows you to create spells on the fly with any /6/modifers/6/, /6/shapes/6/, or /6/actions/6/ you have made /5/Rote/5/. And it allows you to add up to 6 /6/actions/6/ onto any spell you want.
/4/Warning if you want to add multiple damaging /6/actions/6/ onto a spell they need to have a delay between them due to immunity frames./4/
